item.title: 69th Legislature Convenes January 13 Amid New Faces, Projected Deficit - WSPTA
item.description: News article "69th Legislature Convenes January 13 Amid New Faces, Projected Deficit - WSPTA" from Washington St Pta.

item.title: 👍Dr. Concie Pedroza - Superintendent, Tukwila School District
item.description: Dr. Concie Pedroza signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Superintendent, Tukwila School District.
